00085 /*
00086  *      JOHN FIX the account menu calls I commented out...
00087  */
00088 void doBookWork( int answer )
00089 {
00090   string actname,uname,u2name;
00091   int cat, ucode, u2code;
00092 
00093   switch (answer) {
00094         
00095   case 1:  
00096     book.listAccounts();
00097     cout<< "Please Select an account to open, type in the name \n";
00098     cin>>actname;
00099     book.openAccount(actname);
00100     //displayAccountMenu();
00101     break;
00102         
00103   case 2:
00104     book.insertAccountByHand();
00105     //displayAccountMenu();
00106         
00107     break;
00108   case 3:
00109     book.listCat();
00110     displayBookMenu();
00111         
00112     break;
00113         
00114   case 4:
00115     book.listCat();
00116     cout<<"Type 1 if you ant to create a category, and 2 for a sub-category \n";
00117     cin>> cat;
00118     if (cat ==1){
00119       cout<<"Please type the category's name\n";
00120       cin>> uname;
00121       cout<<"Please type the category's code (int)\n";
00122       cin>> ucode;
00123       Category tmp("all", 0);
00124       Category usr(uname, ucode);
00125       book.addSubCat(tmp, usr);
00126       displayBookMenu();
00127     }
00128     if(cat ==2){
00129       cout<<"Please give the category name you want a sub-category in\n";
00130       cin>>uname;
00131       cout<<"What is that category's code?";
00132       cin>>ucode;
00133       cout<<"What do you want the sub-category to be called?";
00134       cin>>u2name;
00135       cout<<"What do you want the sub-category's code to be (int)? \n";
00136       cin>>u2code;
00137       Category usr(uname, ucode);
00138       Category usr2(u2name, u2code);
00139       book.addSubCat(usr, usr2);
00140       displayBookMenu();
00141     }
00142     break;
00143         
00144   case 5:
00145 
00146     displayMenu();
00147     break;
00148         
00149   default:
00150     cout<<"Invalid Selection, Try again\n";
00151     displayBookMenu();
00152     break;
00153   }
00154 
00155 }

00216 void displayMenu()
00217 {
00218   int answer;
00219 
00220   system( "clear" );
00221 
00222   cout << "DOLOR --  Accounting Program\n"
00223        << "############################\n\n" ;
00224 
00225   cout << "1. READ IN A SET OF BOOKS \n 2. ADD A SET OF BOOKS \n 3. SAVE AND QUIT \n";
00226   cin >> answer ;       
00227 
00228   doWork( answer);
00229 
00230 }
00231 
00232 void doWork(int answer){
00233 
00234   string bookname, bookmemo, filename;
00235 
00236   switch(answer){
00237         
00238   case 1:
00239     cout<<"Please enter a file name to read in\n";
00240     cin >>filename;
00241     book.read(filename);
00242     displayBookMenu();
00243         
00244     break;
00245         
00246   case 2:
00247     cout<<"Enter in the name of the Set of Books \n";
00248     cin>> bookname;
00249     cout<<"Enter in a memo \n";
00250   
00251     cin>> bookmemo;
00252     book = Books(bookname, bookmemo);
00253     displayBookMenu();
00254     break;
00255         
00256         
00257   case 3:
00258     book.write(filename);
00259     cout<<"goodbye\n";
00260         
00261     break;      
00262         
00263   default:
00264     cout<<"Invalid Selection, Try again\n";
00265     displayMenu();
00266     break;
00267   }
00268 }
